# excludedRoutes

**Instance Property**

The IPv4 network traffic that the system routes to the primary physical interface, not the TUN interface.

## Declaration

```swift
var excludedRoutes: [NEIPv4Route]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property excludes routes that the system might otherwise include from the [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEIPv4Settings/includedRoutes] property. The system automatically excludes the IP address of the tunnel server.

## Routing network traffic

- **includedRoutes**: The IPv4 network traffic that the system routes to the TUN interface.
- **NEIPv4Route**: The settings for an IPv4 route.
